newsitem.title: GERMANY: TENNIS-STICH LOOKS TO MASUR TO GUIDE BACK TO THE TOP.
newsitem.headline: TENNIS-STICH LOOKS TO MASUR TO GUIDE BACK TO THE TOP.

text.p: Former Wimbledon champion Michael Stich has asked Wally Masur to try to guide him back to the top of world tennis.
Masur, a former Australian Davis Cup player, will work with Stich at this week's Stuttgart Open and next week's Paris indoor tournament.
The pair will decide afterwards if he is to become the German's next coach.
Stich, who has fallen to 20th in the world rankings, beat Dutchman Paul Haarhuis 7-5 6-1 in the first round of the Stuttgart event on Tuesday.
